alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 9:44AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Estelline. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1644.0 feet, significant flooding of crop and pasture land begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 1644.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Friday was 1644.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1644.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1644.4 feet on 03/29/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Location Stg Stg Day/Time Big Sioux River Estelline 1644.0 1644.4 Fri 10 AM CDT &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 1245 PM CDT.
